mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock ( item_id, stock_amount, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{stockAmount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT stock_amount FROM stock s JOIN item i ON i.item_id = s.item_id AND i.is_active = b'1' WHERE stock_id = #{stockId}
SELECT stock_amount FROM stock s JOIN item i ON i.item_id = s.item_id AND i.is_active = b'1' WHERE s.item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.update: UPDATE stock s JOIN item i ON i.item_id = s.item_id AND i.is_active = b'1' SET s.stock_amount = #{amount}, s.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE s.item_id = #{itemId}

UPDATE stock s JOIN item i ON i.item_id = s.item_id AND i.is_active = b'1' AND i.store_id = #{storeId} SET s.stock_amount = s.stock_amount + #{amount}, s.updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE stock_id = #{stockId} AND s.store_id
